Starscream bloted straight down into the trees. He ejected DrillBit 
and than transformed to bot mode. He looked KitKat over, and when the 
cockpit landed he explained.

"She's hurt badly. The fall has caused massived damage to her nervous 
circutry. She'll probably live, but she might need extensive surgery 
to walk again, maybe even to go from bot to beast. I don't know if we 
have those tools, and if we did they were probably in the cave. We're 
baseless, equipment less, and if we don't do something soon she may 
never move again. What can we do?"

Starscream heard her mumble something about Phobia being on the ship.

"Phobia's still there! Look after her, I'll be back in a sec."

Starscream picked up his Cockpit, placed it back, turned to Jet Mode 
and took off towards the ship to rescue Phobia. Starscream estimated 
he had a minute before the ship hit the ground, which might set off 
another reaction. If Phobia was still inside when it hit the ground, 
she would die. He slipped in the escape hatch, but the fire was all 
around he couldn't see anything. He started calling.

"Phobia? Phobia, can you here me?"
